post.body: I'm doing backyard birding this year so books - he's become obsessed with feeding birds & squirrels :)
It's his stocking stuffer :)
Admin RARELY closes - didn't 1st day, did 2nd day. That's why it was weird and I didn't expect it.
I worked at a SD admin building during that. Drove in, got a cracked windshield from a thrown rock, only to find they closed!
I'm ready for more :) Hubby's on duty today, makes it harder for him, but means we can hang out tomorrow in it :)
A copy of the Jennifer Aniston January edition of GQ :) He'll be thrilled. :)
WEDNESDAY AND WEDNESDAY NIGHT...CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SNOW. HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S.
OCCASIONAL SNOW SHOWERS. NEW SNOW ACCUMULATIONS UP TO 2 INCHES THIS AFTERNOON. HIGHS 27 TO 31.
Hoping for more tonight :) Loving it.
We have 3 inches down here :) Loving it!
www.princesstimetoys.com/blog Good luck!
:) The question was supposed to be for someone else. I didn't even notice yours changed :)
I know, but think about the good part - kids will be having parties with princesses. If you get better, start again with new!
Hey back at ya! It's *S*N*O*W*I*N*G here~
Blech! Brownish red or brownish green :)
@ArtcardsbyskyM What happened to your other id?
If you recover you can buy shiny new stuff! Besides, locally can be within a couple hundred miles.
I'm listening to the same thing. Crazy storm predicted for tonight. Are you ready?
Yes, a few hours from there.
Heck, I'm an adult and I don't follow that rule ;)
Pullman, WA
Last Wed they predicted HUGE storm - schools closed - nothing happened. Media gave the schools a hard time.
I'd be more comfortable if my son was home, or not coming home. Don't want him traveling the pass today. Can't reach him. :(
What are cakesters?
Absolutely calm and bright here - can't believe storm is coming.
Luckily I did not buy my Christmas Eve groceries yet - yikes!
Husband is stocking up on gas & Cheetos. Can I use you as a backup when the Cheetos run out?
Yes, same thing. Link the radio gave is crashing. Nice
I like the cold, it's the wind I can do without. Knocks out the power, ie., no internet :) I have online stores.
Hubby bought a generator yesterday - today buying chains to lock it up and gas. Guess he believes them. We'll see.
Good to know about the FN Magazine - I think my son will love it.
How nice. :)
Hi and goodnight! :)
Yes :)
Yes, he's a gate/ticket agent for Alaska. They also direct the planes into the gate and said he couldn't see the marks :)
They do it so they can work them longer and make sure they can be back first am :) Bad thing is, dirty underwear ;)
Last time Alaska put them all up in a Seatac hotel. Really hoping they're going to do that again.
High-five! :)
I have a doctor's appt - wasn't ready for it :) Now I'm hoping they reschedule.
What? How's that possible!
Bad yes, but wouldn't they be oh so good right now! If son calls, I'm finding a drive thru with ice cream!
Crazy, isn't it! So much for a dusting to 1" and then turn to rain :)
But the kid is 23 - can't exactly tell him what to do :(
B4 Dh went to bed we were listening to the wrecks happening on his radio - some severe injuries - not worth trying to drive home.
I wouldn't have paid 2 cents :)
How much snow do you have? We're at 4 - not bad for not calling this snow :)
Yep. :( I could get a vegetarian version online, but never liked it enough to work that hard for it. Right now I'm addicted to PS
At least you weren't talking about chocolate, whipped cream, nuts, cherries....oh wait....now I want those ;)

RT @BlondeByDesign Please vote & RT to help #16 Jill donate to SPCA! http://techmamas.typepad.com/ Thanks!
Still tired. Going back to sleep.
Join the One2One Network = Opportunity to win a Hannah Montana Gift Package! www.princesstimetoys.com/blog
How weird, another weather alert that is not a test. I've lived here 40 years and never heard one before. Avalance warning - wth?
First time I've ever heard a REAL special alert on the radio - usually just tests. Guess they're serious about today's storm - nice out now
Join the One2One Network = Opportunity to win a Hannah Montana Gift Package! www.princesstimetoys.com/blog
Oh, going to sleep. Who knows when they'll let him off and I'll have to make the trip again. Freeways are bare & wet, the rest is icy!
Got to the airport only to receive a phone call that they were putting him on mandatory OT. Just got back :)
Son is calling.
The caption on this photo is too funny: http://tinyurl.com/7podud Seattle Snow
